page.title: 07SCHOOL OF THE FUTURE
page.content: We think school buildings will have solar panelled roofs to supply energy for the computers,lighting and heating. Pupils will use computers and printers instead of pencils and books.Instead of a black board there will be a big screen in front of the class room connected to a computer and to the television network.We think there will still be human teachers but they might be assisted by robot and computer learning systems.Teachers will be trained to work computers and make progams.We think there will be progams for English and Maths instead of books. If you are doing a certain topic you would tipe in the name and get what you needed on your screen. For example,if you were doing Africa you would get maps and information. SIMON,LEE,ADAM, aged 10
